name: io.github.easytocloud/mac-letterhead
title: Mac-letterhead
description: Professional letterhead PDF generator for macOS with Markdown support and smart margin detection

tools.name: create_letterhead_pdf
tools.description: Create a letterheaded PDF from Markdown content. Converts Markdown to professionally formatted PDF with smart margin detection and letterhead overlay. Supports GFM, tables, code blocks, and custom CSS styling.

tools.name: merge_letterhead_pdf
tools.description: Merge an existing PDF with a letterhead template. Applies letterhead overlay to existing PDFs with multiple blend strategies (darken, multiply, overlay, transparency). Preserves original document formatting.

tools.name: analyze_letterhead
tools.description: Analyze a letterhead template to determine margins and printable areas. Uses smart content detection to identify header, footer, and logo positions. Calculates optimal margins for document content.

tools.name: list_letterhead_templates
tools.description: List all available letterhead templates in the ~/.letterhead directory. Shows template names, file paths, and associated CSS files.

systemDependencies.name: pango, cairo, fontconfig, freetype, harfbuzz
systemDependencies.description: Optional system libraries for WeasyPrint high-quality rendering
systemDependencies.install: brew install pango cairo fontconfig freetype harfbuzz

examples.name: Generic multi-style server
examples.description: Generic server where style is specified per tool call

examples.name: Style-specific server
examples.description: Dedicated server pre-configured with a specific letterhead style

examples.name: Custom output directory
examples.description: Server with custom output directory for generated PDFs

configuration.setupInstructions: Place letterhead PDF files in ~/.letterhead/ directory. Optional CSS files can be added with matching names (e.g., ~/.letterhead/company.pdf and ~/.letterhead/company.css).
